titles.flashcardsSetTitle: Title of the set of flashcards

contents.registerUsernameDesc: It's your username, visible for other users. Remember: Your username should be unique.
contents.registerEmailDesc: It's your email address. This one isn't visible for other users. By this one you can confirm your register and sign in
contents.registerPasswordDesc: Remember! Password should be secure. Minimum 8 characters, small and big letter, numbers etc.

registerFooterInfo.content: If you have account, you can log in

loginFooterInfo.content: If you don't have account, you should

contents.flashcardsTitleDesc: This field must have between 2 and 28 letters.
contents.nameColumnDesc: This field must have between 2 and 20 letters.
contents.flashcardsCreatorDesc: Welcome to the creator of flashcards. You can make new flashcards here. How long will it take? Only 30 seconds! Yes, that fast! And after made this one, you can start learning.
contents.emptyFlashcards: You don't have any flashcards yet
